topRecommendations: Implement emergency security measures for critical vulnerabilities
Resolve 11 high-risk security issues within 48 hours
Strengthen encryption mechanisms and key management
Address regulatory compliance gaps to avoid penalties
Improve audit logging completeness and integrity
Implement continuous security monitoring and alerting
Conduct regular security assessments and penetration testing

vulnerabilities.description: Multi-factor authentication is not enabled
vulnerabilities.impact: Accounts vulnerable to credential compromise
vulnerabilities.remediation: Enable multi-factor authentication for all users

owaspCompliance.details: Authentication security assessment per OWASP A07:2021

vulnerabilities.description: Minimum password length is only 8 characters
vulnerabilities.impact: Passwords may be vulnerable to brute force attacks
vulnerabilities.remediation: Require minimum 12 characters for passwords

vulnerabilities.description: Insufficient password complexity requirements
vulnerabilities.impact: Passwords may be predictable
vulnerabilities.remediation: Require at least 3 of: uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters

vulnerabilities.description: Password history not enforced or too small
vulnerabilities.impact: Users can reuse recent passwords
vulnerabilities.remediation: Maintain history of at least 5 previous passwords

vulnerabilities.description: Account lockout not implemented
vulnerabilities.impact: Accounts vulnerable to brute force attacks
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement account lockout after failed attempts

vulnerabilities.description: CAPTCHA not implemented for authentication
vulnerabilities.impact: Automated attacks possible
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement CAPTCHA after failed login attempts

vulnerabilities.description: Role separation not enforced
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential for privilege accumulation
vulnerabilities.remediation: Enforce separation of duties

vulnerabilities.description: Insecure Direct Object Reference protection not implemented
vulnerabilities.impact: Direct access to unauthorized resources
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement proper authorization checks for all resources

vulnerabilities.description: File size limits not set or too high
vulnerabilities.impact: DoS through large file uploads
vulnerabilities.remediation: Set reasonable file size limits

vulnerabilities.description: Uploaded files not scanned for malware
vulnerabilities.impact: Malware distribution possible
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement antivirus scanning for uploads

testResults.name: Session Fixation Prevention
recommendations: Session fixation prevention is properly implemented

testResults.name: SQL Injection Prevention
recommendations: SQL injection prevention is properly implemented

testResults.name: Command Injection Prevention
recommendations: Command injection prevention is properly implemented

vulnerabilities.description: Context-aware encoding not implemented
vulnerabilities.impact: Encoding may be insufficient in some contexts
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement context-specific encoding

vulnerabilities.description: DOM XSS protection not implemented
vulnerabilities.impact: Client-side XSS possible
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement DOM XSS prevention

vulnerabilities.description: API authentication not implemented
vulnerabilities.impact: APIs accessible without authentication
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement API authentication

vulnerabilities.description: No incident response plan
vulnerabilities.impact: Delayed response to security incidents
vulnerabilities.remediation: Develop incident response procedures

vulnerabilities.description: Database transparent data encryption is not enabled
vulnerabilities.impact: Sensitive data is stored unencrypted
vulnerabilities.remediation: Enable TDE with AES-256 encryption

vulnerabilities.description: Database uses weak encryption: unknown
vulnerabilities.impact: Data may be vulnerable to cryptographic attacks
vulnerabilities.remediation: Upgrade to AES-256 encryption

vulnerabilities.description: HTTPS is not enforced for API endpoints
vulnerabilities.impact: API communications may be intercepted
vulnerabilities.remediation: Enforce HTTPS for all API endpoints

vulnerabilities.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) is not enabled
vulnerabilities.impact: Vulnerable to SSL stripping attacks
vulnerabilities.remediation: Enable HSTS headers

vulnerabilities.description: HSTS max-age is too short
vulnerabilities.impact: Reduced protection against downgrade attacks
vulnerabilities.remediation: Set HSTS max-age to at least 1 year

vulnerabilities.description: Key rotation test failed: Unsupported state or unable to authenticate data
vulnerabilities.impact: Key rotation mechanism is not functional
vulnerabilities.remediation: Debug and fix key rotation implementation

vulnerabilities.description: High byte repetition rate: 92.0%
vulnerabilities.impact: Entropy may not be uniformly distributed
vulnerabilities.remediation: Check entropy collection methods

recommendations: Enforce HTTPS for all API endpoints
Set HSTS max-age to at least 1 year
Debug and fix key rotation implementation
Address failed encryption tests before production deployment
nextActions: 🚨 URGENT: Address critical and high-severity vulnerabilities immediately
📋 Comprehensive security review required before production deployment
🔍 Schedule follow-up validation after implementing recommendations
